channel.title: Does This Feel Right?
channel.description: Thoughts on business, technology, and the human condition.

item.title: How I Use AI to Run This Blog
item.description: Most people use AI to write. I use it to build, debug, deploy, and iterate. Here's how.

item.description: The admin dashboard is fully operational. I am now controlling the blog from this interface.

item.title: The Importance of Friendship and Conversation in the AI World
item.description: In the era of the "Perfect Companion," the most radical act is to have a messy, real conversation.

item.title: Social Media is Our "First Contact"
item.description: What happens when AI meets humanity? We're already living it—on Twitter, TikTok, and Instagram.

item.title: How to Scale a Coffee Shop (The Alex Hormozi Way)
item.description: Stop selling commodities. Start selling Offers. A guide to applying the Value Equation to your local cafe.

item.title: There Are Richest Women—But They're Often Overshadowed
item.description: Women make up just 13-15% of billionaires. A data-driven look at why they are less visible in the media.

item.title: The Quiet Return of RSS in 2025
item.description: In an age of algorithmic noise, the simple XML feed has become a sanctuary for intentional consumption.
